Name: Three Hundred Poems
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Blackcurrant jam adds rich concentrated berry notes to this attractive crimson red cognac laced cocktail.
History: Created in 2015 by Konrad Kaczmarzyk at ECC Chinatown , London, England.
